meanings.definition: A small mass of hair that forms in the stomach of a cat or other animal.
meanings.sent1: My cat often coughs up hairballs after grooming herself.
meanings.sent2: The vet warned us about the dangers of hairballs in cats.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd have to clean up hairballs when I got a pet!
meanings.sent4: Dealing with a hairball is like finding a surprise in your cat's stomach.
meanings.sent5: The sight of a hairball on the carpet made me cringe.

meanings.definition: A tangled mass of hair that forms in the drain of a shower or sink.
meanings.sent1: I had to call a plumber to remove the hairballs clogging the drain.
meanings.sent2: Hairballs in the shower drain can cause water to back up.
meanings.sent3: It's always a hassle dealing with hairballs in the sink.
meanings.sent4: The hairballs in the drain were like a puzzle to untangle.
meanings.sent5: The sight of hairballs in the sink made me reach for the drain cleaner.
